name: Find The Bottle Neck
description:
A disastrous event has left your little town in shambles, leaving a small group of survivors to fight for their lives. Left with little to no resources, you have to decide who will leave the group, in order for the somewhat worthy to thrive. 

This game was made for Curdle jam #27, but was not published.  It's still very early in the development, and a lot of the features are missing. I might develop the game further, or I might not. I didn't have time to finish Roberto's sprites, so he might look a little bit wonky.
